TextLibrary.Text: Your Imperial Majesty, it is an honor to meet you.
Your Imperial Majesty, it is an honor to meet you.
So you are the boy from MRI who found Beta Prime, yes?
So you are the girl from MRI who found Beta Prime, yes?
She is aboard my ship, off this planet, Majesty.
She is aboard my ship, off this planet, Majesty.
Are you reading my mind, boy?
Are you reading my mind, girl?
No, Majesty. I've come to seek the help of Lumina in tracking these creatures you may have seen recently. We call them the Soulless.
No, Majesty. I've come to seek the help of Lumina in tracking these creatures you may have seen recently. We call them the Soulless.
Prove to me this is not an MRI trap. Shoot down the three MRI ships that patrol the Vega System and return. Then we will talk.
Prove to me this is not an MRI trap. Shoot down the three MRI ships that patrol the Vega System and return. Then we will talk.
